content.text: Where the voltage carried by the overhead power supply is ≥ 20 kV, insulator fittings of at least 0,3 m length  should be used to isolate the fittings used to attach both cables and joint closures from the structure of the  tower or pole.

requirements.text: Where the voltage carried by the overhead power supply is ≥ 20 kV, insulator fittings of at least 0,3 m length  should be used to isolate the fittings used to attach both cables and joint closures from the structure of the  tower or pole.
